name: Jeff the Killer Cube
description:
Jeff The Killer Cube is a #puzzle Game for #killjam

You play as Jeff a ruthless cube who has seen it all until one day he decides he has to kill..

So kill he does..

You take part in a local tournament which pits you against 10 challenge filled levels with a hidden baddy inside of each.

Run, jump and glide your way through this challenge and kill all the enemies.

Throughout the game world is hidden time capsules be sure to collect these if you want to stay in the competition.

Each level has 5 collectables you need to collect to unlock the next challenge.
